name: Sparky (itch)
description: This is a game I made for the Pippin Barr Game Jam, with the theme of "Rapidly Press X". It is the first game I have ever made, so while it is not perfect, it is mine, and I finished it. So I am happy. As I continue to learn more coding, I plan to come back and revisit Sparky, and make this game better and better as I go.
